metadata.title: CVE-2015-6941 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: win_useradd, salt-cloud and the Linode driver in salt 2015.5.x before2015.5.6, and 2015.8.x before 2015.8.1 leak password information in debuglogs.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
